Package com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.windows

Class DecimalSumAggregatorListener

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.streams.operator.window.StatefulWindowListener<DecimalSumAggregatorListener.AggregateInfo,Tuple>
com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.windows.DecimalSumAggregatorListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
StateHandler, StreamWindowListener<Tuple>, Closeable, AutoCloseable, EventListener
public class DecimalSumAggregatorListener extends StatefulWindowListener<DecimalSumAggregatorListener.AggregateInfo,Tuple>
Sample window listener to demonstrate window aggregation on a decimal attribute. This class incrementally maintains the number of tuples in the window and the sum of a decimal attribute in the AggregateInfo class. As tuples are inserted their attribute's values are added to the sum and subtracted from the sum as they are evicted.
Through the facilities of StatefulWindowListener this class supports partitioned and non-partitioned windows. An AggregateInfo is maintained for each partition.
Sliding and tumbling windows are supported. The trigger for a sliding window or the eviction for a tumbling window results in a output tuple being delivered to the specified output port. The attributes sum and count will be set to the sum and count values respectively. Each output tuple will be followed by a WINDOW_MARKER punctuation mark. The class supports all window definitions.
